name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-graph-app-secret-expiration
title: Applications Secrets Expiration Web Part
shortDescription: This sample web part shows the list of your applications registered in Azure AD along with their associated client secret/certificate expiration date.
longDescription: This sample web part shows the list of your applications registered in Azure AD along with their associated client secret/certificate expiration date.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
